analysis.Summary: Vue SFC that renders a cloud-upload SVG icon with a customizable fill color.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable 'upload' icon component for navigation or other UI areas in the Martyrs-based project.

Components.name: IconUpload
Components.responsibility: Render an SVG upload icon and accept a 'fill' prop to customize its color.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Declare and type-check component props in the <script setup> context.

fill.description: CSS color string used as the SVG path fill.

analysis.Usage: Import as `import IconUpload from 'modules/icons/navigation/IconUpload.vue'` then use `<IconUpload fill="#FF0000"/>` in templates.
Notes: No <style> block: icon styling is purely via SVG attributes and CSS variables.
Uses inline `fill-rule` and `clip-rule` on the second <path> for proper rendering.
Purely presentational, no side effects or lifecycle hooks.
